snippet.title: Early Access Alpha | SCP: PANDEMIC | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
SCP: Pandemic (Alpha) is a hardcore cooperative first-person tactical shooter. You are a rogue fireteam going against the SCP Foundation and their ongoing attempt of global omnicide. You start at Area 12, the site where the Psi-Z program is being actualized.

Get SCP: Pandemic on Steam to support development (or wishlist): https://scp.games/pandemic
Check out SCP.GAMES: https://scp.games
Accredited SCP Wiki contributor list: https://affray.link/scp-credits

Follow our roadmap: https://affray.link/trello
Submit and upvote suggestions for development: https://feedback.pandemic.gg

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/affray
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/affraystudios

Level 5 Clearance on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/franchise/l5c
7K Contest Hub: https://affray.link/scp-contest-hub/7k

This project is massively work-in-progress. A lot of features and improvements are planned through Early Access. Story elements will also be revealed throughout ongoing development.

Based on SCP-5000 by Tanhony.

#SCPPandemic #SCP #SCPFoundation
